Captain Steph Catley and Caitlin Foord combined in a flash of brilliance on the left flank to unlock the German midfield. Catley found herself released, striving fo - [Matildas handed brutal reality check in Olympics opener against heavyweights Germany](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/sport/sport-news-australia/matildas-handed-brutal-reality-check-in-olympics-opener-against-heavyweights-germany/view/)The Matildas have suffered a brutal reality check in their bid for a first-ever Olympics medal, slumping to a 3-0 defeat to heavyweights Germany in the opening match of their Olympics campaign. - [Two weeks to save the Games – can Paris 2024 restore the dream factory? | Barney Ronay](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/sport/sport-news-australia/two-weeks-to-save-the-games-can-paris-2024-restore-the-dream-factory-barney-ronay/view/)On Friday the Olympics swing into full action, but can the spectacle still drown the detail, cost, greed and waste?“We need to re-enthuse.” This was probably the closest Emmanuel Macron came to a tearful cri de cœur during his latest address on the eve of France’s Olympic Games. It is a reasonable enough statement in itself, although one that might be more accurate with the removal of the “re” part. Welcome to Paris 2024, the 33rd modern Olympic Games, and the - [The thrill of stumbling across a football match while away on holiday](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/sport/sport-news-australia/the-thrill-of-stumbling-across-a-football-match-while-away-on-holiday/view/)Whether in Oslo, Reykjavik or an Anglesey caravan park, happening upon a game is always a happy accidentBy Mike Whalley for When Saturday ComesThe guidebook I had during a holiday in Oslo late last summer recommended the museum dedicated to sculptor Gustav Vigeland (portrayer of human struggle, recluse, twice divorced, hater of dogs, and alleged Nazi sympathiser, whose most well-known work took 14 years to complete and resembles a giant phallus). So off I went. But as I strolled through the neig - [Lando Norris says he’s not proud of ignoring McLaren team orders](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/sport/sport-news-australia/lando-norris-says-hes-not-proud-of-ignoring-mclaren-team-orders/view/)British driver only let Piastri through after 17 laps in Budapest‘Could it have been handled differently? Yeah, absolutely’McLaren’s Lando Norris has admitted he did not handle the team orders controversy which marred the Hungarian Grand Prix last week well, admitting that he was not proud of himself and that he would behave differently if the situation arose again.In Budapest Norris ignored orders to allow teammate Oscar Piastri back into the lead after the British driver had - [Lando Norris says he is not proud of ignoring McLaren team orders](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/sport/sport-news-australia/lando-norris-says-he-is-not-proud-of-ignoring-mclaren-team-orders/view/)Briton let Piastri through only after 17 laps in Hungary‘Could it have been handled differently? Yeah, absolutely’McLaren’s Lando Norris has admitted he did not handle the team orders controversy which marred the Hungarian Grand Prix last week well, admitting that he was not proud of himself and that he would behave differently if the situation arose again.In Budapest Norris ignored orders to allow teammate Oscar Piastri back into the lead after the British driver had gained th - [Celine Dion, Lady Gaga and 45,000 police officers ready for the greatest show on earth](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/sport/sport-news-australia/celine-dion-lady-gaga-and-45000-police-officers-ready-for-the-greatest-show-on-earth/view/)City on high alert as security is beefed up ahead of what promises to be a spectacular opening ceremony … if it all goes to plan. - [The Matildas wanted a dream start to the Games. It was a 90-minute nightmare](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/sport/sport-news-australia/the-matildas-wanted-a-dream-start-to-the-games-it-was-a-90-minute-nightmare/view/)Australia arrived in France with ambitions of a deep run into the Olympic tournament. Against Germany, it was the worst possible start. - [Germany 3-0 Australia: 2024 Paris Olympic Games women’s football – live reaction](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/sport/sport-news-australia/germany-3-0-australia-2024-paris-olympic-games-womens-football-live-reaction/view/)Germany dominate Group B opener in MarseilleAny thoughts? Email or get in touch on X @rendellxMinutes from kick-off and the Marseille Stadium is surprisingly empty for such a blockbuster Olympic clash. The 67,000-capacity venue is the second largest stadium in France - and its vastness is showing, with only the lower-levels of the ground occupied, and even then with large patches of white seats.
